Project.Brief history of your project and organi: At the end of December 2024, our company made a bold decision to embark on an unprecedented journey of self driving around Hainan Island in 30 days. The travel team consisted mainly of our operations, research and development, photography, and logistics. What unexpected events will happen along the expected 1600 kilometer circumnavigation route, accompanied by waves. We will depart from Shenzhen to Haikou, then travel all the way to Sanya, and finally head east, passing through Lingshui and Wenchang before returning to Haikou. In this episode, we will complete one-fifth of the journey in one breath, starting from Shenzhen, passing through Haikou City, and arriving in Lingao County
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Some short video clips of traveling work, including videos, photos, etc.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset:
All tools inside singularity
Here are some commands.

singularity prep create test /mnt/10.0.8.31/disk1/0/202408/cars/test/ /mnt/md0/test/
singularity prep create disk6 /mnt/10.0.8.31/disk6 /mnt/mergerfs

singularity prep list
singularity prep status MyData

singularity repl start  disk1  -csv /tmp -s 10 -d 528 minerID wallet
singularity repl start disk1 -csv /tmp  minerID wallet


singularity  repl list -v
singularity  repl status -v +id
